txt.en: The Enemy has begun the siege of Minas Tirith. You must hold against the Enemy's forces.
The battle is not over. You should await Mithrandir and Imrahil's command.
Mithrandir is standing near the baths of Minas Tirith.\n\nThe Enemy has begun the siege of Minas Tirith. You should speak to Mithrandir before the battle begins.
Hold Aragorn's flank as he confronts the main Corsair host.
The Oathbreakers have swept over the Corsair host, driving them back in supernatural terror.
Defend the walls of Minas Tirith from the Enemy
Talk to Mithrandir when you are ready to begin
Elrohir and Elladan must survive the battle

The War for Gondor begins as the hosts of Minas Morgul and Mordor make for Minas Tirith.

Merit Rating

This quest starts with <rgb=#FFFF00>empty</rgb> Merit Rating.

<rgb=#FF0000>Gain Merit from:</rgb>
- Keep soldiers of Gondor alive
- Defend supplies and armaments
- Protect siege weapons and barricades
- Topple the Enemy's siege towers
- Defeat the Enemy's mightiest servants
